title: unnai tudi sheivEn
sahitya:
unnai tudi sheivEn chennimalai mannavA inrum enrum en idaya pUrvamAi


anupallavi

  enniru karangaLAl unniru padam paTri innisaip-pAkkaLAl unnuLLam urugavE


caraNam    panniru karam koNDu bhaktaraik-kaNDadum unnaruT-koDai tandu udaviDum ayyanE
ponnaDi unadinai pOTri vandiDum ennai ini enrum inbura sheyyavE
